name: SimCity 2000
overview: A Japan-only release of SimCity 2000 for the Nintendo 64. This version has some additional features, mainly mini-games, a dating game, TV to replace the newspaper, horse races and monster breeding, among others, all of them in 3D. A few new "natural" disasters are also included, most of them being giant monster attacks (players are able to use their monster to fight against them).
